page.title: 17FARM LIFE
page.content: As a 13-year old living on a farm in our survey area,I have a very busy,varied and interesting life. I travel daily by bus to Killicomaine School in Portadown,but my brother attends Richmount,the local primary, and is collected by mini-bus.We transfer from the primary school at 11+.When I stay after school for choir hockey practice or drama society I have to be collected by car because there is no bus suitable. Before I leave each morning I attend to the hens,while Tom brings in the cows for milking.I unlock the hen- house,feed them,collect eggs and let them loose.I have to lock them up every night to save them from foxes.In winter I help give silage to the cattle and feed the pigs.Spring is a busy time preparing the fields for seeding or planting.
